page.title: 20THE PROJECT
page.content: THE RESEARCH FOR THIS PROJECT WAS CARRIED OUT BY THE FIRST YEAR GIRLS OF THE GROVE SCHOOL, HINDHEAD. IN ADDITION TO COUNTING THE AMENITIES; CATEGORISING THE LAND COVER; AND TAKING PHOTOGRAPHS, THEY ALSO COMPILED AND DISTRIBUTED QUESTIONNAIRES DESIGNED TO FIND OUT AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE ABOUT THE LOCAL POPULATION AND ITS LIFE STYLE IN I985. THEY ALSO VISITED MANY OF THE LOCAL INSTITUTIONS WHERE THEY WERE MADE MOST WELCOME. THE FOLLOWING GIRLS MADE CONTRIBUTIONS:POLLY ABBOTT, JANICE COPELAND, EMMA PONSONBY, JULIE NORSTRAND, LISA ROBERTS, MICHELLE WHEATLY, PHILIPPA PAYNE, MELUSINE TAYLOR.
